title: Pulsar Product Page
short-desc: A sample web page showcasing Pulsar's X2 Wireless gaming mouse, featuring detailed product images and key features.
long-desc: This project involved designing a sample web page to showcase Pulsar's X2 Wireless gaming mouse. The page features detailed product images and highlights key features of the mouse, such as its wireless technology, ultra-lightweight design, and ergonomic shape. The goal was to create a visually appealing and informative layout that effectively promotes the product to potential customers.

title: Earprint - Music App UI Design
short-desc: A user interface design for a social media music app that combines music sharing with interactive connectivity features.
long-desc: This project showcases a user interface for a music app where users can share what they're listening to and connect with others, similar to social media platforms. The design includes a 'currently listening' section and a 'listen along' option, enhancing the experience by blending music sharing with social interaction.

title: Nike Newsletter - Ja Morant 2
short-desc: Created a dynamic newsletter highlighting the key features and inspiration behind Nike's Ja 2 basketball shoe.
long-desc: Crafted an engaging newsletter to introduce Nike's new Ja 2 basketball shoe, bringing to life its key features and the inspiration behind its design. The project involved transforming detailed product information into concise, reader-friendly highlights that showcase both the shoe's performance benefits and its connection to NBA star Ja Morant's dynamic style.

title: Valorant Champions Tour 2023 Graphics
short-desc: Created graphics for upcoming and finished matches in Valorant's 2023 Championship Tour using Photoshop.
long-desc: For this project, I created graphics for upcoming and finished matches in Valorant's 2023 Championship Tour using Photoshop. The graphics were designed to be eye-catching and informative, featuring team logos, match schedules, and other relevant information. The goal was to create visuals that would engage fans and enhance their viewing experience of the tournament.

title: Logo Collection
short-desc: A collection of sleek and modern logos designed for personal and company branding.
long-desc: This project collection features a series of sleek and modern logos designed for personal and company branding. Each logo represents a unique identity built to reflect the brand of the client.

title: Portal 2 Level Design
short-desc: Created a playable level within Portal 2 that features an innovative use of portal mechanics, while offering players a challenging and engaging puzzle within the game.
long-desc: In this project, I created a playable level within Portal 2 that showcases innovative use of portal mechanics. The level offers players a challenging and engaging puzzle while demonstrating creative design and understanding of the game's mechanics. The goal was to create a memorable and enjoyable experience for players that balanced difficulty and time to complete the level.

title: Isometric Level of Illinois State's Quad
short-desc: Created an isometric level design using the unique paths and angles of Illinois State's Quad, emphasizing its layout in a detailed and visually appealing style suitable for a virtual game.
long-desc: This project involved creating an isometric level design of Illinois State University's Quad, emphasizing its unique paths and angles in a detailed and visually appealing style. The design was created with the intention of being suitable for a virtual game, showcasing the campus layout in an interactive and engaging way. The goal was to capture the essence of the Quad's design while adding a creative twist for a virtual environment.
